What is Angular Maphilight?

Angular Maphlight is an Angular directive that lets you highlight specific areas of your HTML image map, add hovering effect on them, and style them separately in an Angular friendly way.

View examples

Installation & Usage

  • Install it using bower:

    bower install angular-maphilight

  • Reference it in your Angular app:

    angular.module('yourApp', [ 'angular-maphilight' ]);

  • Wrap both your image and your html map in an angular-maphilight directive: 

    <angular-maphilight id="MapTitle">
<img src="src/images/shapes.png" width="500" height="300"/>
<map>
<area shape="rect" title="Rectangle" coords="60,109,277,179">
<area shape="circle" title="Circle" coords="377,144,47">
</map>
</angular-maphilight>
